channel.title: mayumi on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in mayumi on Barefoot Rob

item.title: lesson in Akihabara
item.description: 19:51 Thursday 11 July 2019 JST Today there were only 1.5 students in my Akihabara class. This number is down from our high of like 8 last year when I had to stop checking homework during the lesson because there ended up being no time for class. I guess there would be time with just 2 students’ worth of homework. Anyway, the lesson kinda devolved into a China vs Japan debate.

item.title: lessons in Akiba
item.description: 17:33 Thursday 21 February 2019 JST Now I am headed to Akihabara for lesson with Mayumi and them.

item.title: bought some puzzles
item.description: 18:17 Saturday 16 December 2017 I bought five puzzles today after seeing some that I had had as a kid. The woman at the shop suggested four as being difficult, and I selected a fifth one because I liked its design.
